title: Quinoa with Balsamic Vegetable Kebabs
ingredients: ['150g quinoa, rinsed', '400ml hot vegetable stock, made with a stock cube', '2 x 250g packs roasting vegetables, such as wedges of red onion, pepper strips, and chunks of courgette and squash', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2-3 sprigs of fresh thyme', '200g can sweetcorn, drained', '15g butter', '125g frozen peas or sliced green beans', '250g marinated tofu, cut into bite-sized cubes', '1 tsp mild chilli powder or a few shakes of Tabasco sauce, to taste', '3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '2 tbsp balsamic vinegar']
